body_html: I think Sparse tensor + Constant is a good idea if it makes implementing pointwise one tensor and two tensor ops easier. Storing the constant tensor in _values makes the internal representation a bit complicated, and it might be simpler to store it in a separate field.
body_text: I think Sparse tensor + Constant is a good idea if it makes implementing pointwise one tensor and two tensor ops easier. Storing the constant tensor in _values makes the internal representation a bit complicated, and it might be simpler to store it in a separate field.
body: I think `Sparse tensor + Constant` is a good idea if it makes implementing pointwise one tensor and two tensor ops easier. Storing the constant tensor in `_values` makes the internal representation a bit complicated, and it might be simpler to store it in a separate field.
